rules.name: Valid_Screens_for_Patient_and_Partner
rules.label: Valid Screens for Patient and Partner `

fields.name: WarningText
fields.fieldText: A Day 1 ({!Get_Cycle.Day_1__c}) already exists on this cycle. Are you sure you want to re-enter it? This can have significant consequences if done flippantly.

fields.name: tital
fields.fieldText: The following issues are preventing the creation of a Day 1. Please resolves these and then rerun the Create Day 1 Event.

fields.name: IssueswithCycle
fields.fieldText: This patient does not have a valid referral.

fields.name: NoScreens
fields.fieldText: This Patient or Partner do not have valid screens entered

fields.name: Thepricingtype
fields.fieldText: This cycle has not got pricing set properly

fields.name: noFinTExt
fields.fieldText: This cycle doesn't have a valid Financial Consent

fields.name: DonorText
fields.fieldText: Please note that because this is a donor cycle you can still proceed past this screen to log a Day 1.

fields.name: No_Screens_0
fields.fieldText: WARNING: This patient and or partner have a positive infectious screen!!

fields.name: OutstandingTExt
fields.fieldText: This patient has outstanding invoices. While you can still log a Day 1 an email will be sent to administration to inform them of this issue. You are also encouraged to discuss this issue with the administrative team.

fields.name: ConfirmHeightandWeight
fields.fieldText: Please confirm the Patients height and weight below.

textTemplates.name: EmailAlertInvoices
textTemplates.text:
Hi,


This email is just to let you know that a Day 1 has been raised on cycle {!Get_Cycle.Name} for {!Get_Cycle.Patient__r.Name}. It appears that this patient may have outstanding invoices that you may want to follow up.


Thanks,


{!$User.FirstName} {!Get_User.LastName}
